message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's in great condition and worth a lot more than that. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the condition of the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it. Would you be willing to accept this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, $100 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $110 to see if we can reach an agreement.  Let me know what you think.
